mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, b.*, (SELECT content FROM areas z WHERE b.area = z.area AND z.sigungu = 999) AS area_content, (SELECT content FROM areas z WHERE b.area = z.area AND b.sigungu = z.sigungu) AS sigungu_content FROM ( SELECT * FROM accomodations a, contents c WHERE a.content_id = c.id AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY content_id ) b ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
SELECT * FROM contents c, accomodations a WHERE c.id = a.content_id AND a.content_id = #{content_id}
SELECT count(*) FROM accomodations a, contents c WHERE a.content_id = c.id AND c.status = 1 AND is_deleted = 0
